pr_title: NMS-12872: Fix Minion startup command to use credentials from environment with health-check

timeline.message: NMS-12872: Fix running Minion with docker and adding the health check
NMS-12872: Fix old Karaf shell health:check command to indicate the new opennms:health-check

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            <10> Run our health check to indicate the Minion is ready. It uses internally the `opennms:health-check` running in Karaf.

timeline.diffHunk:
